html:
5.3.24  12:10 am   have you heard of drum corps

      sort of

5.2.24  9:58 pm   Do you feel that the Bronze Age (3000-1000 BCE) was important to the development of modern society, or could we have skipped that era in favor of a different method of living that did not eventually include the results of bronze being discovered? If you feel that this age could've been skipped, by your own interpretation of life, what do you feel would've happened instead?

      i don't know enough about metal to say for sure. the metals might have gone in a different order depending on location and availability. but either way it leads eventually to the telephone

5.2.24  9:17 pm   why is the average joe average and if so, why the average 'joe': why not the average 'dave' or 'chris'? is joe considered an average name?

      it was, at the time the phrase was popularized, but what's equally important is which name seemed to sound best in the phrase

5.2.24  9:01 pm   how can I get good at jazz and understand what jazz artists are doing? I listen to a lot but I don't get a lot of it.

      in music, you can only get good at things you like. you will automatically get good at things you like to do. so as long as you like it and you like to do it then you're gonna be fine

5.2.24  8:41 pm   bill how do i figure out how to get myself out of a pretty small bucket (i am typing this from inside the bucket)

      do a press conference, saying you're not in the bucket

5.2.24  6:58 pm   Are you a Cartesian dualist?

      i have a membership card to the cartesian dualist society but i can't remember if it's counterfeit

5.2.24  6:32 pm   who would win in fight between batman and yourslef

      there would actually be no fight, but there would be 2 different stories, published in rival newspapers, each reporting the opposite result

5.2.24  6:12 pm   Where do we go from here?

      there

5.2.24  5:41 pm   why do i want the things i want? is there a branch of science that tries to answer that? all I get from google is self-help articles about motivation and whatnot. i'm not sure what keywords to use to find literature around the question

      there's at least 4 or 5 reasons to want things

5.2.24  3:18 pm   how many marbles should I hide today? ( I have a small bag of them with one large marble out of the bunch)  (not kidding)  

      hide everything other than the marbles. although that may not be necessary, because everyone is probably already focused on the marbles

5.2.24  2:42 pm   What's your favourite time signature?

      4

5.2.24  2:03 pm   i feel like taking a music class would limit my creativity, but i want to learn music theory a lot, but i feel like it would be better if i taught myself, even though it would be a lot harder. what should i do

      you could spend a day in class just out of curiosity, just to see what they're talking about in there, but music is like fruit. no one on earth is gonna be able to tell you how to taste a fruit

5.2.24  11:08 am   Where can I buy oranges?

      on ebay for sure

5.2.24  10:01 am   what are your thoughts on cash

      soft, and yet still quite rough

5.2.24  9:47 am   why is it that sometimes i can be so graceful and so smooth and other times i fall into a bush while getting into my car

      this increases your potential range as an actor

5.2.24  9:30 am   Do you remember the alamo?

      i think i blocked it out of my memory

5.2.24  7:40 am   Why isn't it possible?

      what

5.2.24  7:19 am   what is the best way to make a basic chord sound more "jazzy"? 

      nothing makes a chord sound like that. the only thing to create the sound you're suggesting is to simply say the word 'jazzy'

5.2.24  6:19 am   My mate Oli wanted to know your thoughts on the flat earth theory, and flat earth? Do you believe the Earth is round?

      yes, but i know what they're thinking of. refrigerator magnets

5.2.24  5:39 am   Got any grapes?

      i am co-owner of some grapes

5.2.24  2:08 am   what do you think about overpriced shoes

      the only thing you told me about these particular shoes are that they are overpriced. so the only thing i know about the shoes is that they are priced higher than you would like

5.2.24  12:53 am   Is there more hate or love in the world

      actually it's up to you

5.1.24  9:54 pm   Do you like cheese fondue?

      i can only begin to imagine cheese fondue

5.1.24  9:38 pm   why do they call plain things vanilla if vanilla is an unplain flavor?

      maybe it's based on the icecream menu, where vanilla is typically positioned as the most basic, being the first item on the menu at also the lowest price point

5.1.24  7:59 pm   Opinion on trains

      a classic mainstay of the space & time industry

5.1.24  7:52 pm   How many times do you plan to blink today

      i don't plan my blinking. all my blinks are therefore unplanned

5.1.24  7:12 pm   If you read a lot of books can you learn to read a room?

      you can learn to read a room regardless of bookreading. bookreading is a completely different type of reading process

5.1.24  6:45 pm   do you like the trombone?

      yes, while also disliking it

5.1.24  6:30 pm   What is your opinion on Dubstep?

      it's music. another name for music is dubstep

5.1.24  6:00 pm   What are your thoughts? Not on anything in particular, just in general.

      ..      ..                        ..

5.1.24  5:21 pm   Do you like penguins

      yes but i'd like them more if they were even better

5.1.24  2:02 pm   What are the key patterns?

      changing, staying the same, and changing between changing and staying the same

5.1.24  12:05 pm   Help I accidentally made a podcast

      ok i'll be right over

5.1.24  11:12 am   What's the most aerodynamic letter?

      o

5.1.24  10:46 am   what songs you wrote in 2020 

      'special sandals'

5.1.24  9:55 am   what is a fun new activity you can do with some bread

      drop kick

5.1.24  7:37 am   Best guitar tuning?

      EAEABE

5.1.24  6:45 am   brownies or peanut butter cookies??

      throw them both against the wall and then you should know which one is which

5.1.24  3:56 am   can you give me a sick bar for a rap song 

      potential flash flooding in your area until 7:45 pm today

5.1.24  1:12 am   Why does online banking exist.

      because there's more room for more money on the internet





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

4.30.24  11:53 pm   Just wondering, how many melodicas do you own?

     0

      You seem like the kind of guy to have more melodicas than the average joe

      you have drastically misjudged me. actually it seems like you've mistaken me for, in fact, an average joe

4.30.24  11:08 pm   what is the thought process behind the little animated segments in your newer videos

      i'm just trying to find what plays the best on screen

4.30.24  8:29 pm   swans or ducks...?

      i continue to await the swuck

4.30.24  5:21 pm   How often do you eat sandwiches? What's your favorite type of sandwich? I know you don't usually pick favorites besides not picking a favorite, and that makes loads of sense for sandwiches. Sandwiches are an experience. Eating them one way is a waste of your time. Anyways, back to the question. Do you have a favorite sandwich, or a sandwich you usually like to prepare? Not that I'm implying that the favorite sandwich is the one you usually like to prepare or vice versa, I'm just saying one you gravitate towards, not necessarily in a favorite sort of way, if you don't have a favorite or favorites.

      i can't tell you which sandwiches i prioritize, because that would make it easier for you to defeat me

4.30.24  2:12 pm   whats your opinion on the letter h

      unbelievable. outstanding.

4.30.24  11:40 am   How do you find your voice?  I mean that mostly in the sense of music but other advice might be helpful too.

      what do you really want your voice to be

4.30.24  11:38 am   do you have any advice for getting vocal takes that don't make me want to transform into an oyster?

      try doing it the way an actual oyster would do it

4.30.24  11:25 am   I'm presenting some of your videos to my class at  art university next week. What should I tell them about you?

      i was on the hollywood blacklist in the mid 20th century, but that was only due to a typographical error

4.30.24  10:57 am   I graduated from college, what now

      you'll have to make another college

4.30.24  10:56 am   how do i become time

      too late, you already are
